719563f-b.text:
East River Drive, at the foot of East 60th Street, showconstructional details of this new marginal thoroughfare. The view is eastward towards Welfare (Blackwells) Island. Thereupon appears new hospital facilities. Beyond is Long Island City and Astoria on the 2ueens shore.
No's. 1-B August 1, 1939
P. L. Sperr
719563f-b.folder: East River Drive & 60th Street (East), Manhattan, NY

719563f-a.text:
East River Drive, at the foot of East 60th Street, showconstructional details of this new marginal thoroughfare. The view is eastward towards Welfare (Blackwells) Island. Thereupon appears new hospital facilities. Beyond is Long Island City and Astoria on the 2ueens shore.
No's. 1-B August 1, 1939
P. L. Sperr
719563f-a.folder: East River Drive & 60th Street (East), Manhattan, NY

719562f-b.text:
East River Drive, north from East 0th Street, showing constructional details of this new marginal highway., In the background are hospital and laboratory structures. The latter is the Rockefeller Research and the former, the New York Hospital-Cornell Medical College Center.
April 10, 1940 No. 2
August 1, 1939 No. 1
P. L. Sperr
719562f-b.folder: East River Drive & 60th Street (East), Manhattan, NY
